sqlList.sql: select 0 AS ID, '作为顶级分类' AS TYPENM from dual union all select lp.ID, lp.NAME_CN AS TYPENM from t_lm_b_destination_type lp order by ID
select lp.ID, lp.NAME_CN AS TYPENM from t_lm_b_destination_type lp where SHOW_FlAG='1' order by lp.ID
select 0 AS ID, '作为顶级分类' AS TYPENM from dual union all select lp.ID, lp.NAME_CN AS TYPENM from t_lm_b_destination_type lp where lp.ID <> :ID order by ID

select lp.ID, lp.PARENTS_ID, lm.name_cn AS PARENTSNM,lp.NAME_CN AS TYPENM, (CASE lp.status WHEN '0' THEN '下线' WHEN '1' THEN '上线' ELSE '' END ) as ONLINEDIS, lp.CREATE_TIME AS CDTIME,lp.UPDATE_TIME AS UDTIME from t_lm_b_destination_type lp left join t_lm_b_destination_type lm on lp.parents_id=lm.id ORDER BY lp.ID DESC
select lp.ID, lp.PARENTS_ID AS PARENTSID, lp.NAME_CN AS TYPENM,lp.status AS ONLINESTATUS, lp.CREATE_TIME AS CDTIME,lp.UPDATE_TIME AS UDTIME from t_lm_b_destination_type lp where ID=:ID
select lm.ID, lm.NAME_CN from t_lm_b_destination_type lm where (lm.NAME_CN = :TYPENM)
select lm.ID, lm.NAME_CN from t_lm_b_destination lm where (lm.NAME_CN = :DESNM)
select id,city_id,name_cn from t_lm_b_city t where t.city_id=:CITYID

insert into t_lm_b_destination (id, city_id, type_id, name_cn, address_cn, tel_st, tel_lg, latitude, longitude, status, create_time, update_time) values (:ID, :CITYID, :TYPEID, :NAMECN, :ADDRESSCN, :TELST, :TELLG, :LATITUDE, :LONGITUDE, '0', SYSDATE, SYSDATE)
INSERT INTO t_lm_b_destination_type(ID, PARENTS_ID, NAME_CN, SHOW_FlAG, STATUS, create_time, update_time) VALUES (:ID, :PARENTSID, :NAMECN, '1', '0', SYSDATE, SYSDATE)
select lm.ID from t_lm_b_destination_type lm where (lm.ID <> :ID) AND (lm.NAME_CN = :NAMECN)
UPDATE t_lm_b_destination_type SET PARENTS_ID=:PARENTSID, NAME_CN=:NAMECN,STATUS=:ONLINESTATUS,update_time=SYSDATE WHERE ID=:ID
UPDATE t_lm_b_destination_type SET SHOW_FlAG=:SHOWFlAG,update_time=SYSDATE WHERE ID=:ID AND SHOW_FlAG<>:SHOWFlAG
select city_id AS cityid, area_id AS areaid, name_cn AS name_zh, name_en, name_cn||'('||pinyin_short||') '||pinyin AS cityNM from t_lm_b_city order by pinyin

select dt.id, dt.CITY_ID, tct.name_cn AS CITYNM, dt.TYPE_ID, dtt.name_cn AS TYPENM, dt.name_cn DESTINATIONNM, dt.address_cn AS ADDRESSNM, dt.TEL_ST, dt.TEL_LG, dt.LATITUDE, dt.LONGITUDE, dt.status AS ONLINESTATUS, (CASE dt.status WHEN '0' THEN '下线' WHEN '1' THEN '上线' ELSE '' END ) as ONLINEDIS, (CASE WHEN dt.tel_st IS NOT NULL and dt.tel_lg IS NOT NULL THEN dt.tel_st||'-'||dt.tel_lg ELSE dt.tel_st||dt.tel_lg END ) as TELEPHONE, dt.update_time AS UDTIME, '['||dt.CITY_ID||']'||tct.name_cn AS CITYNAME from t_lm_b_destination dt left join t_lm_b_city tct on dt.city_id = tct.city_id left join t_lm_b_destination_type dtt on dt.type_id = dtt.id where ((:ID IS NULL) OR (dt.id =:ID)) AND ((:CITYID IS NULL) OR (dt.city_id =:CITYID)) AND ((:TYPEID IS NULL) OR (dt.type_id =:TYPEID)) AND ((:ONLINESTATUS IS NULL) OR (dt.status =:ONLINESTATUS)) ORDER BY dt.ID DESC
select lm.ID, lm.NAME_CN from t_lm_b_destination lm where (lm.ID <> :ID) and (lm.NAME_CN = :DESNM)

UPDATE t_lm_b_destination SET CITY_ID=:CITYID,TYPE_ID=:TYPEID, name_cn=:NAMECN,address_cn=:ADDRESSCN,TEL_ST=:TELST,TEL_LG=:TELLG, LATITUDE=:LATITUDE,LONGITUDE=:LONGITUDE,status=:ONLINESTATUS where ID =:ID

select tp.PARENTS_ID AS PARENTSID, td.ICOUNT from t_lm_b_destination_type tp left join (select count(id) AS icount,parents_id from t_lm_b_destination_type where ID <>:ID group by parents_id) td on td.parents_id = tp.parents_id where tp.ID =:ID

select t.prop AS HOTELID, t.CITYID,bdt.id as DESTINATIONID,bdt.TYPE_ID AS TYPEID, t.latitude as HLLATITUDE,t.longitude as HLLONGITUDE, bdt.latitude as DTLATITUDE,bdt.longitude as DTLONGITUDE, bdh.distance AS OLDDISTANCE,'' as DISTANCE from t_lm_b_prop t inner join t_lm_b_destination bdt on t.cityid=bdt.city_id left join t_lm_b_destination_hotel bdh on bdh.city_id=t.CITYID and bdh.destination_id=bdt.id and bdh.hotel_id=t.prop and bdh.type_id=bdt.TYPE_ID where (:CITYID IS NULL OR t.CITYID=:CITYID) AND (:DESTINATIONID IS NULL OR bdt.id=:DESTINATIONID) order by t.cityid,t.prop,bdt.id

merge into T_LM_B_DESTINATION_HOTEL t1 using (select :CITYID AS CITY_ID,:HOTELID AS HOTEL_ID,:DESTINATIONID AS DESTINATION_ID, :TYPEID AS TYPE_ID, :DISTANCE AS DISTANCE from dual) t2 on (t1.CITY_ID = t2.CITY_ID and t1.HOTEL_ID = t2.HOTEL_ID AND t1.DESTINATION_ID=t2.DESTINATION_ID and t1.TYPE_ID=t2.TYPE_ID) when matched then update set t1.DISTANCE=t2.DISTANCE,t1.UPDATE_TIME=sysdate where t1.CITY_ID = t2.CITY_ID and t1.HOTEL_ID = t2.HOTEL_ID AND t1.DESTINATION_ID=t2.DESTINATION_ID and t1.TYPE_ID=t2.TYPE_ID and t1.DISTANCE<>t2.DISTANCE when not matched then insert values (T_LM_B_DESTINATION_HOTEL_SEQ.nextval, t2.CITY_ID,t2.HOTEL_ID,t2.DESTINATION_ID,t2.TYPE_ID,t2.DISTANCE,sysdate,sysdate)
